title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' functionality is not working properly. After closing all editors, creating a new file named f1.txt, and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all opened editors should be closed, including the newly created file f1.txt.
SR: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, follow these steps: 1. Close all editors. 2. Create a new file named f1.txt. 3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
